snippet: The attack left 64 people dead and prompted local civilians to take up arms alongside the soldiers to repel the militants, army officials and residents said.
abstract: Attack by militants linked to Al Qaeda on a Yemeni Army post in Abyan Province sets off clashes that left 64 people dead and prompted local civilians to take up arms alongside the soldiers to repel the militants.
lead_paragraph: The attack left 64 people dead and prompted local civilians to take up arms alongside the soldiers to repel the militants, army officials and residents said.

headline.main: Yemen: Dozens Killed in Militants’ Attack on Outpost
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Dozens Killed in Militants’ Attack on Outpost

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
